review_title: No truss rod , atleast in my guitar. But rest is good for beginners.
review_text: I returned it , reason , no truss rod. For people who doesn't understand, it is a rod that is fitted inside the neck because guitar neck bends after a certain time (and that certain time may vary) , especially guitar with steel strings, making the guitar really hard to play or sometimes unplayable. I am not a guitar pro but i do have some experience with it.I really do wanna give this guitar 2.5 simply because rest else is good, as far as beginners go, of you are really low on budget , need this for some time , maybe a year i don't know i am not a pro. But for beginning with the cheapest you can get you are not gonna get anything cheaper than this and at this price better than this.I hope this helps. üòÄ
Fine for beginners

review_title: A good affordable guitar for beginners and enthusiasts.
review_text: A good affordable guitar for beginners and enthusiasts. Build quality material is average, one that you would expect from a Rs 3K product. But this is not a downer. The sound produced is very good with a rich timbre and resonant tone. After a little tuning you are ready to rock-n-roll. The product was properly packaged. Delivery time left a lot to be desired and can be improved upon considerably.

Product is good ne quality. Guitar was not tuned. Finishing is 90%. Guitar was not packed with air bags. Sound quality is good. Product delivered on last date which was given by amazon and at time 7.30pm. It‚Äôs very good guitar for beginners.

review_title: Pathetic Product.. Absolute Waste of Money..!!
review_text: This is a pathetic product and one star is also given because there is no negative option.firstly the build quality is very poor and if one is serious even for using this product for a decent period of time, I doubt this will not work.secondly there are lots of parts missing in most of the cases. there are many who are suffering as per the review of other customers as well.In my case, strap hose is missing due to which i cannot attach strap to the guitar.Amazon does not offer facility for pickup at most of the areas except top cities even though the product is delivered and fulfilled by Amazon.. another pathetic service from Amazon part.I guess even if one is a first time user and is tight on budget, do not go for such an inferior type of guitar.
